name: Mary Zelensky
about: Hi there! I'm Mary, a passionate gardener and plant stylist based in the heart of the Southwest. I specialize in helping both new and seasoned plant lovers create thriving green spaces. Whether you're looking to build your dream herb garden or just need a few tips on keeping your succulents happy, I’m here to guide you with love, knowledge, and a touch of dirt-under-the-nails magic.

testimonials.quote: Mary has a true gift. She helped me turn my lifeless patio into a lush, thriving garden. Her advice is clear, kind, and totally spot on!
testimonials.name: Maria

testimonials.quote: I booked a quick session thinking I’d just get a few plant tips. I left with confidence and a whole new vision for my backyard. Mary is amazing!
testimonials.name: Jason

sessions.title: Seed Plan
sessions.description: Perfect for the aspiring gardener who needs just a little advice to get started or troubleshoot a specific issue.
